attributes.action: Stop Rabbi Yosef Mizrachi being allowed in the UK to give lectures.
attributes.additional_details:
Rabbi Yosef Mizrachi’s views are not the views of the majority of Jews living in the UK. To allow him into this country to give his misleading and hate filled lectures would be a travesty. 
The Jewish community previously tried to block his last visit in 2016 and they still feel the same now as do many non Jewish people who have children born with disabilities. 
https://www.thejc.com/rabbi-who-implicated-jews-in-shoah-to-visit-uk-rabbi-yosef-mizrachi-1.480443
attributes.background:
Rabbi Yosef Mizrachi Believes that people who get cancer or are born with autism or Down’s syndrome are being punished for past sins. He also believes Jews were partially responsible for the Holocaust because of inter-marriage and the secular lifestyles. 
Please do not let this man into the UK.

rejection.details: We understand that Rabbi Yosef Mizrachi has not been allowed into the UK to give the lectures your petition refers to. We therefore can't accept your petition as the action it asks for has already taken place.
